hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STEMCELL_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Stemcell url - from any http server (NOT HTTPS) accessible from Jenkins - eg. http://bosh-jenkins-artifacts.s3.amazonaws.com/bosh-stemcell/aws/bosh-stemcell-1975-aws-xen-ubuntu.tgz

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SMOKE_MANIFEST_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Which manifest are we deploying as the smoke test

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!bash -e echo "***********************" export DESC="desc STEMCELL: STEMCELL" echo $DESC echo "***********************" RUBY_VERSION=$(ruby -v | awk '{print $2}') export GEM_HOME=/var/vcap/store/gems/$RUBY_VERSION/$JOB_NAME export GEM_PATH=$GEM_HOME export PATH=$PATH:$GEM_HOME/bin gem install bundler -v 1.3.5 ( cd C3CI bundle bundle exec rake cf:upload_and_deploy_release[\ `pwd`/redis-release/releases/redis-1.yml,\ `pwd`/../redis/${SMOKE_MANIFEST_FILE},\ https://${BOSH_MICRO_IP}:25555,\ `pwd`/redis-release,\ ${STEMCELL_URL}\ ] )
